mapper.sql: ID AS id, OBJECT_ID AS objectId, GROUP_ID AS groupId
mapper.select: select g2.id as "id", g2. name as "name", g2.upper_id as "upperId" from sp_item_type_group g2 where 1 = 1 and EXISTS (select 1 from sp_object_group o left join sp_item_type_group g on (g.id = o.group_id) where o.object_id = #{objectId} and g.upper_id = g2.id)
select g.id as "id", g. name as "name", g.upper_id as "upperId" from sp_object_group o left join sp_item_type_group g on (g.id = o.group_id) where o.object_id = #{objectId}
